answers.answer: I would just slow down and eat less little Debbies, I had to even though I'm 13 wks I've only gained two pounds, I started eating sugar free non fat jello and more carrots and celery.. and lots of peanutbutter toast, my secret food I love is mac and cheese I can never get enough, just try a little harder to cut back on the junk food more and you'll be fine, just be carefull because of diabetes okay sweetie, best of luck

Before my first pregnancy I hated chocolate and sweets. I got pregnant and it seemed like I could never get enough of sweets. I was very bad I was 130 and ended up 203...scary. I couldn't control myself so losing the weight was hard. Its been three years and I'm having my 2nd baby this time I'm disgusted with sweets, raw meats, and pasta. I love meat and pasta but it turns my stomach but I'm drawn to lots of fruits now I can't get enough lol
